org.cyclops.cyclopscore.client.gui.component

Class WidgetScrollBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.gui.AbstractGui
      • net.minecraft.client.gui.widget.Widget
        • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.client.gui.component.WidgetScrollBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.client.gui.IGuiEventListener, net.minecraft.client.gui.IRenderable

    public class WidgetScrollBar
extends net.minecraft.client.gui.widget.Widget
    A reusable scrollbar for screens. The using screen must add this as a child and call the following method from its respective method: * drawGuiContainerBackgroundLayer(MatrixStack, float, int, int)} * mouseDragged(double, double, int, double, double) (@see ContainerScreenScrolling for an example)
